topics.body: You know what manga I really hate but I don't want to hate? Blue Exorcist. That series had the potential to be a solid D. Gray-man-esque story with an interesting main character and setting. And some spectacular fucking fight scenes. But the author decided to say "Fuck that noise, I'm gonna pander to the fangirls" and then proceeded to fucking WORSHIP Yukio. To the point of making him a blatant Gary Stu.
